---
title: School Zone
params: 
  inputDir: "gather/"
  thisDir:  "gather/"
  outputDir: "gathered/"
  fileStem: SchoolZoneShapefile
---

```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath('../'))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

This module will gather shapefiles for North Carolina unified school districts.

```{r}
URL <- "ftp://ftp2.census.gov//geo/tiger/TIGER2015/UNSD/tl_2015_37_unsd.zip"
strDownload <- paste0(params$outputDir, "SchoolZoneShapefile.zip")
download.file(URL, strDownload, mode="wb")

unzip(strDownload, exdir = params$outputDir)
```

## 

```{r ListObjects}
lstObjects <- represtools::ListObjects()
represtools::DescribeObjects(represtools::NamesToObjects(lstObjects))
```

```{r Save}
save(file = represtools::OutputFile(params)
     , list = lstObjects)
```
